targets.query: SELECT mean("freq") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("machine" = 'antoine_main') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total_bytes") FROM "ram" WHERE ("machine" = 'antoine_main') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s)  * -1 FROM "disk_io" WHERE ("machine" = 'antoine_main' AND "partition" = 'C:') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT difference(non_negative_derivative(mean("received_bytes"), 10s)) FROM "network" WHERE ("machine" = 'antoine_main' AND "interface" = 'Ethernet') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
